2026-02-09T11:41:37.7781582Z # Daily Repo Status
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7781700Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7781886Z Create an upbeat daily status report for the repo as a GitHub issue.
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7782148Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7782225Z ## What to include
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7782334Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7782543Z - Recent repository activity (issues, PRs, discussions, releases, code changes)
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7782971Z - Progress tracking, goal reminders and highlights
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7783401Z - Project status and recommendations
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7783671Z - Actionable next steps for maintainers
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7784030Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7784161Z ## Style
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7784325Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7784631Z - Be positive, encouraging, and helpful 🌟
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7784914Z - Use emojis moderately for engagement
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7785221Z - Keep it concise - adjust length based on actual activity
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7785447Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7785515Z ## Process
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7785618Z 
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7785725Z 1. Gather recent activity from the repository
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7786061Z 2. Study the repository, its issues and its pull requests
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7786429Z 3. Create a new GitHub issue with your findings and insights
2026-02-09T11:41:37.7786657Z
